import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readline()
    A,B = line.split()
    A = int(A)
    B = int(B)
    print((A+B)%24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

def main():
    a,b = map(int,input().split())
    print((a+b)%24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
import math

import sys

def main():
    line = sys.stdin.readlines()
    for i in line:
        A,B = i.split()
        A = int(A)
        B = int(B)
        print((A+B)%24)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
